1. Lorna Xiao
studio 23 network layer

2. the first 24 bits are constants 152.221.54.--
and the remaining 8 bits vary from 0 to 255

3. 
152.221.54.0/24, first 24 bits dont change

4. 1001 1000.0100 1110.0110 0101.0010 0011 = 152.78.101.35/20
network address:1001 1000 0100 
host identifier: 1110 0110 0101 0010 0011

5. 165.134.0.0/16

6. 16 bits are in host identifier
65 536 ip addresses have been assigned

7. which belongs to subnet 38.191.208.0/20 --> B
	38.1011 1111.1101 0000.0000 0000
0010 0110 = 38
	A) 38.191.240.22 
	38.1011 1111.1111 0000.0001 0110	

	B) 38.191.222.47			
	38.1011 1111.1101 1100.0010 1111

	C) 38.181.210.128
	38.1011 0101.1101 0010.1000 0000

	D) 38.191.207.255
	38.1011 1111.1100 1111.1111 1111 

8.
which subnets match ip address 200.100.50.25 --> A, B, D
	1100 1000.0110 0100.0011 0010.0001 1001

	A) 1100 1000||.0000 0000.0000 0000.0000 0000
	B) 1100 1000.0110|| 0000.0000 0000.0000 0000
	C) 1100 1000.0100 0000||.0000 0000.0000 0000
	D) 1100 1000.0110 0100.0011 00||00.0000 0000

9.
20.40.80.160	0001 0100.0010 1000.0101 0000.1010 0000
matches both
20.40.0.0/16	0001 0100.0010 1000||.0000 0000.0000 0000
20.40.80.0/24   0001 0100.0010 1000.0101 0000||.0000 0000

20.40.80.0 is the longer subnet match (2nd one)

10. 
192.168.1.0/24 		192.168.0000 0001||.0000 0000

A and C
